name: Add info about new Miro widgets to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new widget is created in Miro, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10pIEyjKyqFRVF-9Ht1r1TuZe49jXvMFGaIvtus1r-VA/edit?usp=sharing).
